exclusion.description: Severe depression score or suicidal ideation item flagged.
Extreme risk on any CCAPS-62 T-score.
High acute risk per self-report C-SSRS screener.
Psychotropic medication change within last 30 days.
Poor data quality (speeding or failed attention checks).

metrics.description: At least 70% completion of EMA prompts.
Used the app at least 10 days out of 14.

decision_flow: Step 1: If all inclusion TRUE and no exclusion rules triggered → ProvisionalEligibility
Step 2: After run-in, if (ema_completion_rate >= 0.70) AND (app_usage_days >= 10) → Eligible
Any time if cssrs_high TRUE → SafetyProtocol + Exclusion

messages.eligible: You are eligible to participate. We will contact you with next steps.
messages.not_eligible: You are not eligible to participate at this time. Here are resources for support...
messages.review: Your responses require manual review by the research team. We will follow up.
messages.safety: Your responses suggest acute distress. Please consider the following resources and contact options immediately...
